data: “A natural again!” exulted Jonathan Reuben Wix, as the dice bounded from his plump hand and came to rest upon the billiard-table in Leiniger’s Select Café, with a five and a deuce showing.
"A natural again!" exulted Jonathan Reuben Wix, as the dice bounded from his plump hand and came to rest upon the billiard-table in Leiniger's Select Café, with a five and a deuce showing.
Chester, George Randolph, 1869-1924; Gruger, Frederic Rodrigo, 1871-1953 [Illustrator]; Raleigh, Henry, 1880-1945 [Illustrator]
